channel.title: Commands on Aggregator
channel.description: Recent content in Commands on Aggregator

item.title: Examples
item.description: Sample Aggregator CLI usage # run aggregator-cli.exe (Windows), aggregator-cli (Linux) or dotnet aggregator-cli.dll followed by the command and options. Options valid for any command # All commands accept the --verbose option to print additional messages for troubleshooting. With --namingTemplate, you can specify affixes for all Azure resource that will be created or used. follows { "ResourceGroupPrefix": "aggregator-", "ResourceGroupSuffix": "-sfx", "FunctionAppPrefix": "fp", "FunctionAppSuffix": "fs", "HostingPlanPrefix": "hp", "HostingPlanSuffix": "hs", "AppInsightPrefix": "aip", "AppInsightSuffix": "ais", "StorageAccountPrefix": "strg", "StorageAccountSuffix": "31415" } If you use this, the --resourceGroup option is mandatory.
